languages.text: Вольный Торговец подходит к Мастеру вокса, копошащейся в кожухе разрушенной вокс-станции. "Слава Императору, Лорд-капитан, вы целы! Докладываю: ситуация на борту неясная. К сожалению, принимать приказы из большей части отсеков мы сейчас можем только в письменном виде".

traits.locale_text: Вольный Торговец замечает Мастера Вокса, копошащуюся в кожухе разрушенной вокс-станции. "Лорд-капитан, вы целы! Офицеры постарались на славу — от механизма и целой шестерни не осталось. К сожалению, принимать приказы мы сейчас можем только в письменном виде, однако мне известно, что ситуация на корабле стабилизируется".

languages.text: The Rogue Trader approaches the Vox Master who is rummaging inside the case of a ruined vox-station. "Lord Captain! Praise the Emperor, you're in one piece! The situation on board is unclear. I'm afraid that currently most of the compartments can only receive orders in written form."
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец подходит к Мастеру вокса, копошащейся в кожухе разрушенной вокс-станции. "Слава Императору, Лорд-капитан, вы целы! Докладываю: ситуация на борту неясная. К сожалению, принимать приказы из большей части отсеков мы сейчас можем только в письменном виде".

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader approaches the Vox Master who is rummaging inside the case of a ruined vox-station. "Lord Captain! Praise the Emperor, you're in one piece! Reporting: the situation on board is unclear. I'm afraid that currently most of the modules can only receive orders in written form."

The Rogue Trader approaches the Vox Master who is rummaging inside the case of a ruined vox-station. "Lord Captain! Praise the Emperor, you're in one piece! Reporting: the situation on board is unclear. I'm afraid that currently most of the modules can only receive orders in written form."

The Rogue Trader approaches the Vox Master who is rummaging inside the case of a ruined vox-station. "Lord Captain! Praise the Emperor, you're in one piece! The situation on board is unclear. I'm afraid that currently most of the modules can only receive orders in written form."

The Rogue Trader approaches the Vox Master who is rummaging inside the case of a ruined vox-station. "Lord Captain! Praise the Emperor, you're in one piece! The situation on board is unclear. I'm afraid that currently most of the modules can only receive orders in written form."

The Rogue Trader approaches the Vox Master who is rummaging inside the case of a ruined vox-station. "Lord Captain! Praise the Emperor, you're in one piece! The situation on board is unclear. I'm afraid that currently most of the compartments can only receive orders in written form."

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente se acerca a la maestra de vocos, que está enredando en la carcasa de una estación de voco destruida. «¡Lord Capitán! Loado sea el Emperador, ¡me alegro de ver que está bien! La situación a bordo es incierta. Me temo que por el momento la mayoría de compartimentos solo puede recibir órdenes por escrito».
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader approaches the Vox Master who is rummaging inside the case of a ruined vox-station. "Lord Captain! Praise the Emperor, you're in one piece! The situation on board is unclear. I'm afraid that currently most of the compartments can only receive orders in written form."

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente se acerca a la maestra de vocos, que está enredando en la carcasa de una estación de voco destruida. «¡L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}! Loado sea el Emperador, ¡me alegro de ver que está bien! La situación a bordo es incierta. Me temo que por el momento la mayoría de módulos solo puede recibir órdenes por escrito».

languages.text: 行商浪人朝音阵大师走去，音阵大师正在损坏的音阵站中翻找些什么东西。“舰长大人！赞美帝皇，您安然无恙！船上的情况目前还不太清楚，恐怕绝大部分区域目前只能接受纸质形式的命令了。”
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader approaches the Vox Master who is rummaging inside the case of a ruined vox-station. "Lord Captain! Praise the Emperor, you're in one piece! The situation on board is unclear. I'm afraid that currently most of the compartments can only receive orders in written form."

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人朝音阵大师走去，音阵大师正在损坏的音阵站中翻找些什么东西。“舰长大人！赞美帝皇，您安然无恙！船上的情况目前还不太清楚，恐怕绝大部分区域目前只能接受纸质形式的命令了。”

languages.text: 自由開拓者は、廃墟となったヴォクスステーションの中を捜索しているヴォクス・マスターに近づく。「ロード・キャプテン！皇帝を讃えよ。無事だったのですね！船内の状況は不明です。残念ながら、現在ほとんどの区画が文字による命令しか受け付けません」
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader approaches the Vox Master who is rummaging inside the case of a ruined vox-station. "Lord Captain! Praise the Emperor, you're in one piece! The situation on board is unclear. I'm afraid that currently most of the compartments can only receive orders in written form."

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者は、廃墟となったヴォクスステーションの中を捜索しているヴォクス・マスターに近づく。「ロード・キャプテン！皇帝を讃えよ。無事だったのですね！船内の状況は不明です。残念ながら、現在ほとんどの区画が文字による命令しか受け付けません」

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} tritt an die Voxmeisterin heran, die im Gehäuse einer beschädigten Voxstation herumwühlt. "Lord Captain! Gepriesen sei der Imperator, Ihr seid wohlauf! Die Situation an Bord ist unklar. Ich fürchte, derzeit kann der Großteil der Abteilung lediglich schriftliche Befehle entgegennehmen."
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader approaches the Vox Master who is rummaging inside the case of a ruined vox-station. "Lord Captain! Praise the Emperor, you're in one piece! The situation on board is unclear. I'm afraid that currently most of the compartments can only receive orders in written form."

languages.text: {name} s'approche de la maîtresse-vox, qui est en train de fouiller dans le boîtier d'un poste-vox détruit. « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Loué soit l'Empereur, vous êtes indemne ! La situation à bord reste incertaine. J'ai bien peur que la plupart des compartiments puissent seulement recevoir des ordres écrits pour le moment. »
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader approaches the Vox Master who is rummaging inside the case of a ruined vox-station. "Lord Captain! Praise the Emperor, you're in one piece! The situation on board is unclear. I'm afraid that currently most of the compartments can only receive orders in written form."

traits.locale_text: {name} s'approche de la maîtresse-vox, qui est en train de fouiller dans le boîtier d'un poste-vox détruit. « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Loué soit l'Empereur, vous êtes indemne ! La situation à bord reste incertaine. J'ai bien peur que la plupart des modules puissent seulement recevoir des ordres écrits pour le moment. »

languages.text: Hür Tacir, mahvolmuş bir voks istasyonunun içini karıştıran Voks Üstadı'na yaklaşıyor. "Lord Kaptan! İmparator'a şükürler olsun bir şeyiniz yok! Geminin durum belirsiz. Maalesef şu anda çoğu kompartımanla yalnızca yazılı emirler aracılığıyla iletişim sağlanabiliyor."
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader approaches the Vox Master who is rummaging inside the case of a ruined vox-station. "Lord Captain! Praise the Emperor, you're in one piece! The situation on board is unclear. I'm afraid that currently most of the compartments can only receive orders in written form."

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir, mahvolmuş bir voks istasyonunun içini karıştıran Voks Üstadı'na yaklaşıyor. "Lord Kaptan! İmparator'a şükürler olsun bir şeyiniz yok! Geminin durum belirsiz. Maalesef şu anda çoğu kompartımanlar arasında iletişim yalnızca yazılı emirler ile sağlanabiliyor."
